com.codeferm.dbaccess

Class BaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeferm.dbaccess.BaseTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAtomikosTest, BaseDbcpTest

    public class BaseTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Base test class with common methods used by all other tests. Primarily those are externalizing SQL statements and application properties.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    sgoldsmith

      protected org.slf4j.Logger log
      This would usually be private static final, but I want the extended class name to display for tests.

      Used for all tests to multiply loops by connection pool size.
